title: Laura Bumbulis
text:
Welcome! Iâ€™m a second-year PhD Candidate in Statistics at the University of Waterloo. I completed my BMath in 2022 and my MMath in Statistics in 2024, both also at the University of Waterloo.
My research interests involve multistate modeling under complex observation schemes as well as two-phase designs for longitudinal covariate sampling.
Department of Statistics and Actuarial Science University of Waterloo
200 University Avenue West Waterloo, ON, Canada N2L 3G1
